headerClassName.description: Custom classname applied on the Card header

bodyClassName.description: Custom classname applied on the Card body

footerClassName.description: Custom classname applied on the Card footer

headerProps.description: Custom props applied on the Card header

bodyProps.description: Custom props applied on the Card body

footerProps.description: Custom props applied on the Card footer

noTopDivider.description: If `true`, hide the top divider, between header and body

noBottomDivider.description: If `true`, hide the top divider, between body and footer
